name: PolluZone
description:
This is a game about the hero of PolluZone who is going to save his town through recycling, trading and cleaning his town using the collected resources and learning things. 

This is the thesis project that I developed with the help of my thesis mates, my brother(for the art), and DMMMSU-MLUC in cooperation with DENR Region 1.

I hope you enjoy this game.!
